game.name: One Turn Kill
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: One Turn Kill is a PvE card game where card drawing and deck control are the keys to victory. Engage in battles limited to a single turn for an exhilarating, suspenseful experience.Join the protagonist in a pixel art wasteland to face off with the strongest of enemies and see what story awaits.
game.shortDescriptionEn: One Turn Kill is a PvE card game where card drawing and deck control are the keys to victory. Engage in battles limited to a single turn for an exhilarating, suspenseful experience.Join the protagonist in a pixel art wasteland to face off with the strongest of enemies and see what story awaits.
